animeTitle: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari
animeDescription: The story is about a 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabewho is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Sokaizan which he is supposed to save. He also befriends many of the Soukaizan natives, and forms some very strong friendship bonds. (Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru 2', 'Other: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Shichikon no Ryuujinmaru']
animeStaff: [['Iuchi, Shuji', 'Director, Script'], ['Negishi, Takayuki', 'Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Oshima, Michiru', 'Music'], ['Yatate, Hajime', 'Original Creator']]
